id3VybDovL2RvY3MudjEvZG9jOjI1MDgzNmFmZjE.value: HSBC UK comprises Wealth and Personal Banking, Commercial Banking, a restricted Global Banking and Markets business and a Corporate Centre.HSBC UK is a major UK bank that is strongly connected to the rest of the HSBC Group and leverages this network to help support customers and generate revenue across key trade corridors around the world.
